title: Hey Duggee - Rescue Badge
cardDescription: The Rescue Badge is from Hey Duggee Season 1 Episode 5 and has a fire engine with a red rectangle frame.
description: The Rescue Badge is from Hey Duggee Season 1 Episode 5 and has a fire engine with a red rectangle frame.

content.content: Badge is done working around the starting chain.

content: ch 5, 2 sc to 2nd ch from hook, 2 sc, 4 sc into last ch, 2 sc, 2 sc to first ch [12]
sc, 3 sc in next st, 6 sc, 3 sc in next st, 2 sc, 3 sc in next st, 6 sc, 3 sc in next st, sc [28]
2 sc, 3 sc in next st, 8 sc, 3 sc in next st, 4 sc, 3 sc in next st, 8 sc, 3 sc in next st, 2 sc [36]
3 sc, 3 sc in next st, 10 sc, 3 sc in next st, 6 sc, 3 sc in next st, 10 sc, 3 sc in next st, 3 sc [44]
sl st with SC, 3 hdc, inc hdc, 12 hdc, inc hdc, 8 hdc, inc hdc, 12 hdc, inc hdc, 5 hdc where last one is made in first slst, slst [48]

content.content: Fasten off and hide the yarn ends.

content: with red ch 10, sc to 2nd ch from hook, 8 sc, turn [9]
ch, sc, with pink 5 sc, with red sc, with cyan 2 sc, turn
ch, 2 sc, with red sc, turn

content.content: Fasten off all yarns and leave trails for sewing. Sew in place.

content: with black, 4 sc into magic loop, slst

content.content: Make two tires and sew them partially on top of the fire engine.

content: with black, ch 3, sc to 2nd ch from hook, sc

content.content: Ladder should rest on top of the fire engine cabin, so adjust gray chain length if needed. Sew in place.
